Capitol .viii.	 Capitolo VIII.
De cura de athezil le qual endeveno a las palpebras.	 Capítulo VIII: Sobre el cuidado del quelque se desarrolla en los párpados.
Athezil les quals endeveno a las paupebras dels huels alcuna veguada so humitz, alscunas veguadas son secs.	 Capítulo VIII: Sobre el cuidado del quelque que se desarrolla en los párpados de los ojos, algunas veces están húmedos, otras veces secos.
Donc cove que tu tenguas aquels am tenhalhas o am onci, e inscindas aquels am espatum de las suas razitz, e aprop pausa sobre les locs segi trissat.	 Por lo tanto, es necesario que tengas esos con pinceladas o con ungüento, y los cortes con espátula de sus raíces, y luego coloca sobre los lugares según lo indicado.
Mays si dolor am flux de sanc veno, lahoras tu cauteriza aquels am cauteri lanticular subtil.	 Pero si el dolor viene con flujo de sangre, entonces cauteriza esos con un cauterio delicado.
E la milhor cauterizacio es aprop las inscizios e tropas veguadas retornam quan reman alcuna causa de sas razitz; e quan so cauterizadas am foc, aquelas razitz son comburidas e no retornan.	 Y la mejor cauterización es justo después de las incisiones y cuando se han repetido varias veces debido a alguna causa de sus raíces; y cuando están cauterizadas con fuego, esas raíces son quemadas y no vuelven.
Capitol .ix.	 Capítulo IX.
Cura de grandeyssa que veno a las palpebras dels huels.	 Tratamiento del crecimiento que se produce en los párpados de los ojos.
Motas veguadas endeve en las palpebras dels huels alcuna causa la qual es asemblada a grandissa en sa fortalicia e duricia, e per so grandissia es apelada.	 A menudo se desarrolla en los párpados de los ojos alguna cosa que se asemeja a un crecimiento en su fuerza y dureza, y por eso se llama crecimiento.
E es agreguacio de humiditat grossa en la palpebra dejos e desus.	 And it is an accumulation of thick moisture in the eyelids, both above and below.
Donc la opperacio en lor es que consideras lahoras si la grandissia es procedent en lu en aquo que apar de la palpebra e es mauguda a tota partida; e la causa de lu es leugiera.	 Therefore, the operation for them is to observe whether the swelling is occurring in them from something coming out of the eyelid and affecting the entire area; the cause of this is slight.
Donc fen sobre aquela am fissura per la latitut, e aprop escorga aquela de tota partida am facilitat entro que evasesca, e aprop suspen aquela am onci e abscindeys aquela.	 Therefore, cut over that with an incision through the length, and then look for it in all parts with ease until you find it, and then suspend it with a hook and cut it off.
Mays si a tu no es apparelhada la incizio de lu si no pus que penetras la palpebra am inscizio pauc a pauc, lahoras aquo no notz en deguna causa.	 But if you are unable to locate the incision and can only penetrate the eyelid with slight incisions, then this should be done without any concern.
E si la figura es gran, lahoras tu l’ajusta am sutura; e cura aquela entro que sia sanada.	 And if the wound is large, then you should close it with stitches; and care for it until it heals.
E si es pauca, a tu no sobrevindra mal per aquela quar l’anguent de lu restaura aquela e encarna.	 And if it is small, no harm will come to you because the ointment from it will heal that and close it up.
E si la grandissia es declinant a las partidas dedintz de la palpebra deves la superficia dedintz, lahoras evesa la palpebra e suspen la grandissia am onci, otra que tu indigescas de incizio, e prem aquela de tota part, e si la palpebra per inscizio es alonguada, aquo no notz en deguna causa.	 And if the swelling is descending into the inner parts of the eyelid, you should examine its interior surface; then raise the eyelid and suspend the swelling with a hook or make an incision in it, and press on all sides, and if the eyelid becomes elongated due to the incision, this is not cause for concern.
E aprop la incizio, lava le huel am aygua salada; e cura le loc am aquo que encarna entro que sia sanat.	 E at the beginning, wash the eyes with salt water; and treat the area with water that contains herbs until it is healed.
Capitol .x.	 Chapter .10
De la cura axcirnah en la palpebra desus del huel.	 Of the care for cataracts in the eyelid above the eye.
Axcirnath es grays le qual es engendrat en las tunicas de la palpebra desus, e majorment endeve als enfantz, agrava les huels de aquels et accideyso a lor catartz le mayti; e no podon reguardar la claror del solelh per aquo quar lagremas se coytan ad aquels.	 Cataract is grayish in color and is formed in the tissues of the eyelid above, and it usually affects children, clouding their eyes and causing severe blindness; they cannot look at the bright sunlight because tears constantly flow from them.
E per so tu vezes aquels jaser sobre les lors caras tot temps, e sobre les lors caras dormen; e so a las palpebras de lor dejos les sobrecils humidas, las quals ja ha cuberta imflacio, e iminencia de accernac apparent es en l’uelh; e que quant tu premes le loc am les tieus ditz, tu centes accernac entro aquels.	 And for this reason you see these children constantly squinting, even when they sleep; and their eyelids are wet with tears, which already cover inflammation, and the presence of cataract is apparent in the eye; and when you press on that area with your fingers, you feel cataract within them.
E alcuna manieyra de opperacio es en aquel que le malaute pausa le sieu cap en le tieu se, e aprop pausa drap de li e de lu fay calgua, e fay de lu cercle segon la quantitat la qual contena arthernach de tota partida, e aprop pausa aquel sobre aquela e prem am les tieus ditz de tota per que sia agreguat arcernac en le mieg del cercle, e aprop fen en le mieg de aquela humiditat am spatum inscident am fissura per la latitut, e la fissura no sia major que la fissura que es fayta en flaubotomia.	 And some way of operation is that the patient places his head on your lap, and you drape him with a cloth and make a circle around his eye according to the size that contains the cataract from all sides, and then place that circle over the eye and press with your fingers all around so that the cataract is compressed in the middle of the circle. Then make an incision in the middle of that moist area with a sharp knife, making the incision no larger than the incision made in phlebotomy.
Mays en le preon cove que tu fendas la codena tota entro que pervenguas ad arcernach, quar en las mays desposicios proceseys arcernach per fissura segon la forma de grayseza blanca.	 "But in the case of the scrotum, it is necessary for you to cut the cord completely until you reach the testicle, because during the most serious processes, pus forms in the testicle through a crack according to the form of white bile.
Donc extratz aquela am draps los quals tu as envolopatz entre les tieus ditz a las partidas deforo e revolv entre la ma dextra e sinistre entro que sia dispargut.	 "Therefore, extract it with the cloth that you have wrapped between your hands, and rotate it between your right and left hand until it is drained.
E guarda te que no ajustes en la fissura per so que am le spatum no pervenguas al huel e ladescas aquel.	 "And be careful not to push into the crack, so that with the spatula you do not reach the bone and displace it.
Mays si no apar a tu arternach en le comensament de la fissura, mays que tu ajustes en la fissura un petit am fecilitat entro que procesisca arternach; e aprop extratz aquela ayssi quo havem dit; e aprop submargeys draps de li en aygua e vi agre e pausa les sobre le loc e estrenh aquels am polvils.	 "But if pus does not appear to you at the beginning of the crack, then gently push into the crack until pus is produced; and then extract it as we have said; and then immerse cloths in water and vinegar and place them on the area and tighten them with bandages.
E so alcus que trissan sal e pausan aquel en la conquavitat de la fissura per so que aquo que es remas de aquela humiditat.	 "And also apply salt and place it in the cavity of the crack so that any remaining moisture is absorbed.
E aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	 "And then care for it until it heals.
Mays si accideys en le loc apostema caut, lahoras cura aquel am emplastres cedatils entro que sia sanat.	 "But if a hot abscess occurs in the area, then treat it with soothing poultices until it heals.
Capitol .xi.	 "Chapter 11
De manieyras de tactimi del huel.	 "On the methods of touching the eye.
Quan en las palpebras dels huels so natz pels ajustatz dejos les pels naturals e so antiquatz, lahoras aquels noso al huel e fan endevenir manieras de malautias ayssi cum lacrimas assiduas e mollificacio de palpebras e tela entro que aquo sia causa de destruccio del huel que s’apela tactinir del huel, e cura se en quatre manieyras: o per cauteri am foc; o am medicina acuta segon que denant es dit en le capitol de cauteri; o es fayt atactini per inscizio e sutura; o per cannas segon que yeu diyre.	 "When the eyelids are born with the growth of hair beneath the natural hairs and have aged, these then cause problems for the eye and lead to various illnesses such as constant tears and softening of the eyelids, which can result in the destruction of the eye, called 'touching of the eye'. The treatment for this is done in four ways: either by cautery with fire; or with sharp medicine, as mentioned earlier in the chapter on cautery; or the touching is done by incision and suturing; or with reeds, as I will explain.
E donc cove que tu pauses le cap del malaute en le tieu se; aprop converteys la palpebra del uelh am la tua ma sinistra, e si es convertida, bo es; e sino, entromet agulha en aquela en la qual sia fiel de la partida pus dejos de la palpebra, e fay penetrar la agulha am fiel desus, e aquo sia — prop del marge de la palpebra en le qual naysso les pels — prop dels pels, e tira le fiel a las partidas desus am la palpebra, e converteys aquela am le ray.	 "And so it is necessary that you place the patient's head on your lap; then turn back the eyelid of the eye with your left hand, and if it is turned back, good; and if not, insert a needle into the one in which there is thread from the other side below the eyelid, and have the needle penetrate with thread above, and this should be — near the edge of the eyelid where the hairs are born — near the hairs, and pull the thread to the parts above with the eyelid, and turn that back with the reed.

Capitol .xii.	 Chapter .12
De elevacio de pels pungentz en le huel am agula quan le pel es dur.	 Of plucking stinging hairs in the eye with a needle when the hair is hard.
Quan son pels no-naturals, durs e aspres e pungentz les huels, lahoras la operacio en lu es que tu prenguas agula subtil e pauses en aquela fiel de ceda subtil e leon, e aprop que tu ajustes las extremitatz de lu e nozes quascu en manieyra mot subtil.	 When the hairs are unnatural, hard and rough, stinging the eyes, then the procedure is that you take a fine needle and place it in that thin thread of silk or linen, and then you adjust the ends of it and tie each one in a very fine manner.
E sia la longitut dels fiels de quantitat de una palma.	 And let the length of the threads be about the length of a palm.

Then have the patient sit in your seat and let it be near a good light so that your work may be seen clearly, because this is a subtle and delicate operation.
E aprop intromet la agulha en la razit del pel ajustat la qual ha necessitat de engen, e fay aquela penetrar en la palpebra festinantment entro que extraguas aquela desus le pel natural. E aprop tire le pel entro desus e intromet aquel en alixati, e sian les pels un o dos o tres e no mays.	 And then, pull the hair upwards and insert it into the wax, and there should be one, two, or three hairs, but not more than that.
E aprop tira la tua ma am aquel entro que·l pel sia fora-gitat am alixolati en la palpebra am le pel natural.	 And then, pull your hand with it to ensure the hair is drawn out and inserted into the wax on the eyelid with the natural hair.
Mays si es atirat alixalati e non es gitat le pel, atiraras alixati a las partidas dejos am le fiel le qual tu has compost am aquela, entro qu’en sia gitat alixalati del trau sobira.	 But if the wax is pulled and the hair is not extracted, you will pull the wax from the sides with the thread that you have prepared for this purpose, until the wax comes out of the upper opening.
E vegas aquela am la visio del huel, quar lahoras tu gitaras alixati e lo fiel, e grotan quascu e clautz le huel, e laysse le claus per dos dias o tres, entro que·l pel adheresca al sieu loc e nasque sobre aquel bona carn.	 And check it with the vision of the eye, because when you pull out the wax and the thread, and everything is clean, close the eye and leave the closure for two or three days, until the hair attaches to its place and new skin grows over it.

And if the hair is too short, then you take a long hair from the natural ones, and attach it to that one, or leave it until it grows a little longer, and then pull it out.
Capitol .xiii.	 Chapter XIII
De la cura de ehacratir la qual ve en la palpebra desus.	 Of the care for removing cataracts that appear on the eyelid above.
Quan ve en le huel ehacratir, e es contraccio de la palpebra quan es contrayta en sus, o a dextra o a sinistra partida, per mala consolidacio de plagua o de seccio o de cauteri, e es apelada leporina, e aquesta ahercrati o es natural o accidental, e es fayta per consolidacio de plagua o de seccios o de cauteri, o per semblantz a lor malcuratz.	 When cataracts appear in the eye and there is a contraction of the eyelid when it closes, either to the right or left side, due to poor healing of a wound, incision, or cauterization, it is called leprosy, and this cataract may be natural or accidental, caused by poor healing of wounds, incisions, or cauterizations, or similar to their unfortunate condition.
May la manieyra de la operacio en lu es que tu fendas aquela consolidacio e que separes las labias de lu, e pauses en lu en aquo que es entre aquelas una meca de drap de li, e ligues aquelas entro que sian sanadas.	 May the manner of the operation on him be that you cut through that hardened part and separate its lips, placing between them a piece of linen cloth, and tie them together until they are healed.
E no cove que tu uses de curacio de lu de las causas las quals exsiccan, constrenho; quar si tu fas aquo retorna alixacratir pus mal que nulh temps no foc habantz.	 And it is not fitting that you use treatments on him from those things which dry out and constrain, because if you do this, it will return more inflamed than ever before.
Usa en aquela de causas que mollifico ayssi cum es fenugrec, e embroca am la aygua en la qual son coytz altea e semensa de li, o enguent dyaquilon, le qual sia liquefayt am alcu dels olis, e submergeys en aquel la meca, e cura am aquel.	 Use treatments that soften, such as fenugreek, and soak it in water with altum (or althaea) seeds and linen fibers, or make a salve of diaquilon, which should be liquefied with some oils, and submerge the piece of cloth in it, and cure him with that.
E lo tesaur de la tua curacio es que tu perforsses am tot engen que no sia consolidat segon la forma que foc al comensament.	 And the treasure of your treatment is that you pierce thoroughly everything that is not hardened, according to the form that was at the beginning.
E aquesta operacio la qual havem dita, no es sino alcuna rectificacio de ehalixacrati que no retorna la forma del loc segon que foc denant.	 And this operation which we have mentioned is only a correction of inflammation that does not return the place to its former condition.

Sabel so venas rogas las quals son testudas sobre le huel e prohibeysso al vesement la sua operacio, e develican le huel am longitut de dias.	 Pus comes from veins that are swollen over the eye and prevents the eyelid from performing its function, causing the eye to close for several days.
Donc necessari es al comensament que tu consideres si le huel en le qual es sabel es fort e en lu no es autra malautia que sabel, lahoras tu colligeys aquel sabel.	 Therefore, it is necessary at the beginning to consider if the eye in which there is pus is strong and there is no other ailment besides pus; then you should collect that pus.

Then those veins should be collected with subtle forces, with subtlety, and the blood should be absorbed little by little until you see that the veins are removed from the eye and they roll back.
E guarda te que tu no ledes le huel am las extremitatz del spatum; e si’ la tua operacio en le miegjorn denant le solelh, e sias mot ferm en la tua operacio que no inscidas sino aquelas venas.	 And be careful not to touch the eye with the ends of the spatula; and if your operation is at midday before the sun, and you are confident in your operation so that you do not incise anything except those veins.

Capitol .xx.	 **Chapter 20.**
De reduccio de la eminencia del huel.	 **On the reduction of the prominence of the lip.**
Quan le huel emineys am la sua totalitat e no accideys en le vezement nocument ni diminuacio, lahoras cove que laxas le malaute, e aprop que·l segues, e aprop que pausas ventozas en le cervitz ses scarificacio e succa per bona succaccio; e aprop pausa sobre le huel liniment le qual sia fayt de acatra e aloe e enses e sarcocolla, e aprop strenh le emplaustre sobre le huel am motz polvils.	 When the lip protrudes completely and no damage or decrease occurs during treatment, it is necessary to release the patient, then follow them, and place cupping glasses on the neck without scarification for good suction; and then place a liniment on the lip made of acacia, aloe, sesame, and sarcocolla, and then strengthen the plaster on the lip with many powders.
E la manieyra dels polvils es que prenguas draps de li leons motz, e quascun drap sia duplicat en quatre plecs; e fay de aquels motz.	 And the manner of the powders is to take many linen cloths, and each cloth should be folded into four layers; and make many of them.
E aprop pausa aquels la un sobre le autre segon la quantitat de la qual ha le huel necessitat.	 Then place these one on top of the other according to the amount that the lip requires.
E aprop strenh sobre aquels am drap dur am fort strictura; e itera las ventosas am succio ses scarificacio; e aprop osta las ventosas e leyssa le huel streyt le dia e la nueyt.	 Then strengthen them with a hard cloth and strong compression; and reapply the cupping glasses with suction without scarification; then remove the cupping glasses and leave the lip compressed day and night.
Mays si entretant le liguament es mollificat, lahoras cove que sia mot streyt.	 And if during this time the ligament has become softened, then it is necessary for it to be very tight.
E aprop osta le liament aprop le dia e la nueyt ayssi cum havem dit.	 And then remove the ligament day and night as we have said.
E si vezes le huel ja esser redusit, bo es, e sino, lahoras itera le emplastre am les polvils e la strictura e las ventosas entro que sia sanat.	 And if you see that the wound has already healed, it is good; and if not, then repeat the application of the plaster with the powders and the tightening and the cupping until it is healed.

Capitol .xxii.	 Chapter XXII
De la curacio de la aygua descendent del huel.	 About the treatment of water descending from the nose.
Ja havem dit las specias de la aygua en la divisio e qual conveneys a perforar am sermo declarant, lahoras aquel segon la sanetat. Capitol .xxiv.	 Chapter 24.

Capitol .xxx.	 Chapter 30
D’eradicacio de dentz.	 Of tooth extraction.
Cove que tu cures la dent de la sua dolor am tot engen e tardes en tota eradicacio de lu, quar no es denguna causa que suplisqua la veguada de lu quan es eradicada, quar es sustancia sublima entro que es excusacio en la eradicacio de lu.	 Instruct that you cure the tooth of its pain with all skill and delay any extraction as much as possible, because there is no reason to rush its removal once it is extracted, since it is a vital substance until it is removed from the body.
Mays cove quan le malaute es forsat aquela dent eradicar, que fermament deves tu sia certificat quala es la dent dolent, quar motas veguadas la dolor descep le malaute e cuga que sia en dent sana, e tu eradicas aquela e aprop la dolor no cessa entro que la dent malauta e dolent sia eradicada, quar nos ja havem vist aquo per operacio dels barbies.	 But when the patient insists on having that tooth extracted, you must be absolutely certain which tooth is causing the pain, because often the pain deceives the patient and they think it is in a healthy tooth. If you extract that tooth, the pain will not cease until the diseased and painful tooth has been removed, for we have seen this happen due to the actions of barbers.
Donc cum deves tu es sertificat qual es la dent dolent, e que o sabes be, lahoras cove que tu scarifiques en le circuit de la dent am spatum en le qual sia alcuna vertut, entro que sia dissolvut de la dent de la gingiva de tota partida, e aprop mau aquel am les tieus ditz, o am forfexs subtils al comensament petit a petit entro que aquela concucesquas. Then make the incision carefully with your instruments, or with fine forceps little by little until you reach the tooth.

E guarda te que no fassas aquo que fan alscus ignorantz barbiers en lor fistinacio e audacia sobre la eradicacio de lor, ses que no aministran aquo que nos havem recomtat; quar motas veguadas fan venir sobre les homes malautias grans las quals son pus dificils que sian trinquadas, e las razitz de lor remaugudas totas, o alcunas de aquelas, o que extrayguas aquela am alcus osses de la mandigula ayssi cum motas veguadas havem testificat. E aprop la eradicacio de lu sia lavada la boca am vi caut o vi agre am sal.	 And before removing it, his mouth should be washed with wine or vinegar mixed with salt.

Capitol .xxxii.	 **Chapter XXXII.**
De la cura de las dentz eminentz sobre las autras.	 **On the care of protruding teeth over others.**

And then administer a cure in which powder is generated until the ligaments fall out, and then treat that with suitable ointments until it is healed.
E si es apostema per seccio de vena, lahoras cove que tu tenguas am la tua ma aquo que es a tu possible del apostema am la codena, e aprop intromet la agulha dejos le loc le qual tu has tengut dejos la tua ma, e fay aquela penetrar; e sia en aquela fil doble entro que tu extraguas aquel del autre latz, e aprop ligua le apostema am bo liament segon que yeu he dit a tu en le liament de uva4 de doas partz am doas extremitatz del fil.	 And if the abscess is due to a cut vein, then you should have water nearby as much as possible of the abscess with a rope, and then insert the needle under the area that you had under your hand, and make it penetrate; and let there be a double thread until you draw it out from the other side, and then bandage the abscess well according to what I have told you in the binding of grape leaves on two parts with two ends of the thread.
Mays si temes que extraguam le fil, lahoras entromet le fiel am aquela agula dejos tot le apostema deves la inscizio de la agulha primieyra, e strenh les tieus fiels en quatre locs.	 But if you fear that the thread will be drawn out, then insert a thin thread with the same needle throughout all of the abscess until the initial incision of the needle, and strengthen these threads in four places.
Aprop secca le apostema en le mieg loc de lu entro que quan es yssit aquo que es en lu, lahoras tu inscideys la superfluitat de la codena, e layssa aquo que de lu es liat.	 Then dry the abscess in its middle part until when it has drained what is inside it, then you incise the excess of the rope and leave what is bound to it.
E aprop pausa sobre lu pulvil le qual has submergit en vi e oli, e aprop administra la curacio la qual es fayta am calguas e enguentz entro que sia sanat.	 And then place on the patient's wound the one you have soaked in wine and oil, and then administer the cure that is made with calcined materials and ointments until they are healed.
Capitol l del apostema le qual accideys per torcio de nervis.	 Chapter 1 on the abscess which occurs due to a twist of nerves.
Ayssi cum accideys apostema en arceria e en vena, e semblantment accideys apostema en les nervis quan accideys en lor percussio o accideys per trebal superfluable, e per semblantz.	 So it happens that an abscess occurs in the bowel and in the vein, and similarly, an abscess occurs in the nerves when there is a percussion or excessive labor on them, by resemblance.
E es fayt le mays de lu en les locs dels adjutoris o del talo, o en tot loc en le qual so maugudas las juncturas.	 And it is most common in the areas of the ankles or the sole, or in any place where the joints are aggravated.
E es apostema greu, e es asemblat a la color del autre cors, e es en las majors de lu disposicios ses de lor e quan es streyt am vehementia, sent en lu le malaute semblant stupor.	 And it is a severe abscess, resembling the color of other parts of the body, and it is most prevalent in those who lack their natural dispositions, and when it is narrow with intensity, the patient feels something like numbness.
E no es apostema agreguat en le preon del cors, e per so es dejos la codena, e el es maugut a tota partida e no va a las partidas denant ni detras.	 And the abscess is not collected in the front of the body, and for this reason it is left behind, and it is affected in all parts but does not go to the parts before or after it.
Donc aquo de aquels que es en las juncturas no cove que sia envasit am ferr, quar fort leu endevenguera contracio.	 Therefore, for those who have abscesses in their joints, it is not advisable to be filled with iron, because very quickly they will contract a fever.
Mays aquel que es en le cap o en le front fen la codena am spatum.	 But he who is in the head or forehead, treat him with a spatula.
Mays si es apostema pauc, lahoras te aquel am les forfecs e abscindeys aquel de razitz.	 But if it is a small abscess, then cut that one out with scissors and incise it carefully.
E si es gran, lahoras tu le suspen am unci, e excorja aquel, e aprop osta aquel; e ajusta la plagua am sutura, e cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	 And if it is large, then suspend it with hooks, and excoriate it, and immediately remove it; and close the wound with sutures, and care for it until it heals.
Capitol .li.	 Chapter 2
De seccio de apostema le qual accideys de cheil que accideys al ventre.	 On the incision of an abscess which occurs in the area where the intestine is located at the stomach.
Endeveno ad alcus homes motas veguadas en les ventres de aquels e en las autras partidas del cors de aquels theils les quals son apelatz funguals per similitut de aquels am funges, dels quals la razitz es subtil e·l cap de aquel es gros; e ja las labias de aquels so conversas, e es de aquels que es petit, e es de aquels que es mot magnificat.	 It happens to many men who are observed in their stomachs and other parts of their bodies those which are called fungals by similarity with mushrooms, the cause of which is subtle but the head of it is large; and already the lips of them are turned outward, and they are of those which are small, and they are very magnificent.  (Note: The translation for "funguals" could also be "mushroom-like" or "fungus-like".)
E yeu ja e vist un, e en le ventre de lu eran dos theils les quals eran mays a funges semblantz, e no era diferencia entre aquels blancs, de menuda razitz.	 And I have already seen one, and in his stomach there were two things which were more like mushrooms, and there was no difference between those white ones, of small cause.
E ja las labias de aquels eran enversadas e se fendian, e humiditat corria de aquel tot temps.	 And already the lips of those were turned outward and they split, and moisture ran from that all the time.
Donc yeu inscidegui aquels e atrobegui en la un en pes quays xviii unc. e l’autre quays vi unc.	 When I cut into them, I found one with eighteen punctures and the other with six punctures.
E la operacio en la inscizio de lor es que consideres lahoras si·l malaute es humit, e la color de atheil es blanca, humit, de subtil razitz; lahoras tu le inscideys am spatum lat, e sian en la presencia tua cauteris en le foc, quar motas veguadas deves la seccio de lu es expellit mot sanc; e si te ventz le sanc, cauteriza aquel.	 And the operation in their incision is that you should consider if the patient is humid, and the color of the abscess is white, humid, of subtle reason; then you should incise with a spatula lat, and there should be cauteries present in the fire, because many times you must expel much blood from it; and if the blood comes out, cauterize that.
E si vezes le malaute pauruc e temeros, guarda te de inscizio am ferr; mays lahoras pren fiel de plom recent fayt, e strenh am aquel atheil, la manieyra del qual es aquela que havem dita; e leyssa aquel per dos dias.	 And if you see the patient is weak and fearful, be careful not to incise with iron; but rather take freshly made lead ointment, and strengthen with that abscess, in the manner we have said; and leave it for two days.
E aprop ajusta en la strictura del fil de plom; donc, no cesses strenher le plom granre devetz en theil, entro que sia abscindit e cayha per se ses trebalh.	 And then adjust in the tightening of the lead thread; then, do not stop strengthening the large lead on the abscess until it is burst and falls out by itself without effort.
Mays si theil es de grossa razitz, lahoras en la inscizio de lu es alcuna causa de temor e de paor, e majorment en aquel que es en le ventre.	 But if the abscess is of great size, then there is some cause for fear and dread in its incision, especially when it is in the abdomen.
Mays possibla es que tu inscindas la maytat de lu , e aprop cauteriza aquel per que no retorne.	 But it is possible that you cut open most of it, and then cauterize it so that it does not return.
E aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanada la plagua.	 And then care for that person until the wound is healed.
E guarda te que tu no presumas inscidir theil le qual es de fusca color, de pauc sentiment, de leg reguardament, quar aquel es absi cancros.	 And be careful not to presume to cut open that which is of a dark color, has little feeling, and shows little regard, for that is also cancer.
E yeu vindre am rememoracio de cranc aprop aysso.	 And I will come back with the memory of crab close to this.
Capitol .lii.	 Chapter 52.
De curacio de eminencia del umbilic.	 About the treatment of swelling at the navel.
Eminencia del umbilic es fayta per motas causas; o per fissuras del ciphac le qual es sobre le ventre, e yeys de lu la tela o budel segon que endeve en las autras rupturas; o per sanc le qual flueys de vena o de arceria segon que es denant dit, o per ventositat coarctada en lu.	 Swelling at the navel is caused by several things: either by breaks in the skin that is on the belly, from which the intestine or intestines come out as happens in other ruptures; or by blood that flows from a vein or artery, as has been said before; or by trapped wind.
Mays si es per fissura del ciphac e per yssiment de la tela, lahoras la color del apostema es semblant a la color del cors; e es leon ses dolor, e aprop appar de divers situament.	 But if it is due to a break in the skin and the coming out of the intestines, then the color of the swelling will be similar to that of the body; it is without pain, and soon appears in various places.
E si es per egressio del budel, lahoras le situament de aquel am lu de aquo que havem recontat, de mays vehement diversitat, e cum tu premes aquel am les tieus ditz es occultat, e aprop retorna; e fort leu es am lu so, e es magnificat mot deves le introt de banh e vehement trebalh.	 And if it is due to the coming out of the intestines, then the swelling will be more varied and stronger than what we have said, and when you press on it, it seems hidden, and soon returns; it is also very light, and very much desires baths and strong work.
Mays si per humiditat, lahoras es leon e no es occultat quan premes am la tua ma, ni es constrengut, ni es cregut.	 "But if due to moisture, then it is a lion and not hidden when pressed with your hand, nor is it constricted, nor does it swell.
E si es per sanc, lahoras am aquestz senhals apareys le apostema a negror declinant.	 "And if it is due to blood, then the appearance of the abscess will be blackening.
Mays si es per carn nada, lahoras es apostema greu, gros e dur, e es ficat segon una quantitat.	 "But if it is due to flesh, then the abscess is serious, large and hard, and fixed in quantity.
Mays si es per ventositat, lahoras le tocament de lu es leon.	 "But if it is due to flatulence, then touching it feels like a lion [i.e., it has sharp edges or points].
E la operacio en lu es que consideras lahoras si la eminencia de l’umbilic es per sanc de arceria, o de vena, o per ventositat; lahoras cove que sias prohibit de la curacio de lu, quar en aquela es temor e paor ayssi cum t’e ensenhat en le capitol en le qual he dit les apostemas per arceria e per vena.	 "And the operation on it is that you should consider if the prominence of the umbilicus [navel] is due to blood from an artery, or a vein, or flatulence; then you must be prohibited from treating it, for there is fear and danger in this, as has been taught to you in the chapter where I spoke about abscesses caused by arteries and veins.
E si la eminencia del umbilic es per le budel o per la tela, lahoras cove que comandes al malaute que tengua le ale sieu, e sia stant extendut; e aprop senha am tenta en le circuit de tot le umbilic, e aprop comanda a lu que stia envers entre las tuas mas sobre le sieu dos, e aprop circunda am spatum lat en le circuit del umbilic sobre le loc le qual has senhat am la tenta; e aprop exten la maytat del apostema a las partidas desus am unci gran; e aprop lia en le circuit am fiel fort o am ceda e la manieyra del liar decent.	 "And if the prominence of the umbilicus is due to the intestine or hernia, then you should command the patient to have his hands on his hips, and be standing extended; and then feel with a tent around the entire umbilicus, and then command him to stay between your hands on his hips, and then encircle with spatula lat around the umbilicus over the place that you felt with the tent; and then extend most of the abscess to the sides above with a large hook; and then bind around it with strong thread or silk in a decent manner.
E aprop huebre le mieg del apostema extendut sobre le liament e intromet le dit tieu en aquel indic e quereys le budel; e si tu l’as atrobat ni guardat per le liament, lahoras tu extratz alxorati e impelleys le budel a las partidas dedintz del ventre.	 And then carefully slice the middle of the extended abscess on the skin and insert your finger into that opening; if you have found and secured it with the skin, then extract the intestine and push it back inside the belly.
E si has atrobada la tela, lahoras pren aquel am unci; e inscideys las superfluitatz de lu.	 And if you have found the intestine, then take it with a hook; and cut away its excess parts.
Mays si es contraria a tu arceria o vena, lahoras circunda aquel mot, e aprop retorna a la tua operacio; e pren dos agulhas e met en aquelas dos fiels fortz e entromet dos agulhas en le circuit le qual has feyt entorn le apostema en manieyra de crotz, las quals fassas penetrar; e aprop strenh le apostema en quatre partidas sobre las agulhas.	 But if it is contrary to your bowels or veins, then go around that area, and return to your operation; and take two needles and insert into each of them a strong thread, and insert the two needles into the circle you have made around the abscess in the manner of a cross, causing them to penetrate; and then strengthen the abscess in four parts over the needles.
E si tu vols, osta las agulhas e leyssa le loc entro que poyresca la carn extenduda e caia per si; o inscideys aquel quan es subtiliat e se poyreys, e aprop cura aquel am aquo que cove dels enguentz entro que sia sanat.	 And if you wish, remove the needles and leave the place open so that the extended flesh may dry up and fall off by itself; or cut it when it has dried up and healed, and then cure it with water from the appropriate ointments until it is healed.
E si la eminencia del ombilic es de carn nada en lu o per humiditat, lahoras cove que tu conquaves le apostema ayssi cum havem dit e estraguas le sanc o la humiditat, la qual atrobas en lu, e aprop cura aquel am aquo que cove e que consolide le loc.	 And if the prominence of the navel is swollen with flesh or moisture, then it is necessary that you proceed to open the abscess as we have said and extract the pus or moisture found within it, and then cure it with water that heals and strengthens the place.
Capitol .liii.	 Capítulo 33 (or Chapter 33)
De curacio de cranc.	 Sobre el tratamiento del cáncer.
Ja havem dit, en la divisio, de specia de cranc e en qual manieyra es via a la curacio de lu am medicinas, e que es squivador en lu la curacio am ferr per so que no sia ulcerat; e havem dit cranc engendrat en la mayra e cautela de la curacio de lu.	 Ya hemos dicho, en la división, sobre los diferentes tipos de cáncer y cómo se puede tratar con medicinas, y que es preferible el tratamiento con hierro para que no cause úlceras; y hemos hablado del cáncer en su causa y precaución.
E diyssero les antics que alcunas veguadas cranc es en loc on es possibla la eradicacio de lu, ayssi cum de cran le qual es en las mamillas o en la coyssa e a lor semblantz dels membres allocat a estrayre tot aquel, e majorment quan es comensant petit.	 Y los antiguos decían que en algunas ocasiones el cáncer puede ser eliminado de un lugar donde es posible la extracción, como en el caso del cáncer que se encuentra en las mamas o la pelvis y sus miembros adyacentes, para extirpar todo lo que esté afectado, y especialmente cuando comienza pequeño.
Mays quan es antiquat e es gra, no cove que te propries a lu, quar yeu non pogui sanar de aquel alcu ni no he vist autre, ni que sia pervengut ad aquo.	 Sin embargo, cuando está avanzado y es grave, no conviene abordarlo, porque no he podido curar a nadie de esto ni he visto a otro hacerlo, ni que haya llegado a un resultado favorable.
E la operacio en lu es quan es allocat ayssi cum havem dit, es que tu precedescas e laysses le malaute e purgues de colera negra alcunas veguadas, e aprop sagna aquel, si es atrobada replecio manifesta.	 Y la operación en él, cuando se encuentra como hemos dicho, es que tú actúes primero y dejes al paciente y purgues con hiel negro algunas veces, y luego sángralo si hay una evidente plenitud atrófica.
E aprop prepara le malaute am preparacio en le qual sia locat am operacio, e aprop prohiceys en le trauc uncis les quals cove ad aquel; e aprop concava de tota part am la codena sego bona perexcrutacio entro que no romangua alcuna causa de las razitz de lu.	 And then prepare the patient with the preparation in which he will be placed for the operation, and then provide him with those tools that are necessary; and then ensure that all parts are thoroughly cleansed with good soap until there is no remaining cause of his illness.
E layssa correr le sanc, e no abscidas aquel leugierament, e exprem les locs, e abstergeys le sanc gros tot am la tua ma o am instrument am le qual es a tu possible dels instruments.	 Let the blood flow and do not stop it hastily; express the areas and cleanse all the clotted blood thoroughly with your hand or with an instrument suitable for the task among the available instruments.
Mays si a tu fa contrarietat de sanc gros inscizio de vena o de arceria, lahoras cauterisa aquela entro que·l flux del sanc sia cessat, e aprop cura aquel am l’autra curacio entro que sia sanat.	 But if there is excessive bleeding from the vein or an artery, then cauterize it until the blood flow ceases, and then treat it with another remedy until it is healed.
Capitol .liv.	 Chapter .4
De curacio de ydropici.	 On the treatment of dropsy patients.
Nos ja havem recomtat, en la divisio, de las specias de ydropici de l’aygua, e les senhals de quascuna especia, de la curacio de lu am medicinas.	 We have already mentioned, in the division, the species of dropsy caused by water and the signs of each species, as well as their treatment with medications.
E aquela la qual es curada am ferr no es sino la specia de althitas sola, e no es aproximat am ferr a la specia de timpanistres ni a la especia de yposarcha, quar aquo es mortal.	 And the one that is cured with iron is only the species of althitis alone, and it should not be treated with iron in the case of tympanites or hypothermia, for this is fatal.
E quan tu ja has medicat aquesta especia de ydropici timpanistre am medicinas e no comfereys la tua medicacio, lahoras considera, quar si al malaute ja es conseguida debelitat, o es am aquel autra malautia otra ydropici, ayssi cum si es en lu tos o cos de ventre e semblant ad aquels, lahoras guarda te que no le mediques am ferr, quar temor es sobre aquo. sia de dos partz agudas lonc, de aguda extremitat ayssi cum spatum; mays empero sia en lu alcuna brevitat petit a petit, per so que en la operacio am aquel no passes entro al budel, e que ledas aquel.	 Based on the given context and the similarity to medieval medical treatises in Latin-based languages, here's a line-by-line translation of the provided text:
E aprop considera si la generacio de ydropici es de part dels budels, quar lahoras cove que tu am la seccio te alonhes del ombelic per la quantitat de tres ditz a las partidas dejos, en le dreyt de lu sobre le pentenilh. Mays si la generacio de hydropici es per malautia del fietge, lahoras la tua seccio sia sinistra del ombilic per tres ditz.	 But if the origin of the dropsy is from a liver ailment, then your incision should be on the left side of the navel by three digits.

e es semblant a canula de argent subtil; es fayt de argent o de eram o de lato leon, al qual en la partida pus bassa de lu es un petit trauc, e en les costatz de lu so tres traucs: dos de una partida e un del autra partida; e fayta es la extremitat de lu insciza segon la manieyra de pluma, ayssi cum vezes:	 and it is similar to a thin silver tube; it is made of silver or iron or lead, at the end of which is a small hole, and on its sides are three holes: two on one side and one on the other side; and its tip is cut in the manner of a feather quill, as you see:
E en la extramitat de lu pus sobirana es armilla, quar quan le instrument perve al aygua, lahoras aquela tantost deysen sobre le instrument, donc evacua de l’aygua en la ora miega quantitat, quar si tu evacuas de aquela mes que no cove en la hora, fort leu mor le malaute per resolucio del sieu spirit animal, o accideys a lu cincopi que es appropinquada la mort.	 And on the uppermost part of his extremity is an armilla, because when the instrument reaches the water, they must immediately remove it from the instrument, so that in the following hour it evacuates as much water as possible. For if you cause it to evacuate more than necessary in one hour, the patient will die very quickly due to the loss of his animal spirit, or he may suffer from cynanche, which is a sign of approaching death.
Mays evacua de aquela segon la quantitat de la vertut de lu e segon que significan a tu las disposicios del malaute de la vertut del pols de lu e de la bontat de lu.	 But evacuate according to the patient's strength, and according to what his pulse and complexion indicate to you about his constitution.
E aprop extrats le instrument, e rete l’aygua la qual causa es quar tantost es retenguda per la codena la qual rete le trauc que es sobre le ciphac del qual e recomtat a tu que perfores aquel segon aquela manieyra.	 And immediately after removing the instrument, retain the water that has caused the problem by means of a cord that retains the hole on which you have been instructed to pierce in this manner.

And the next day, and on the following days, if the patient can tolerate it, reinsert the instrument, and extract a small amount of water each time, doing this for several days, taking care to ensure that very little water remains.
Mays si tu temes sobre le malaute, e leyssas de l’aygua gran quantitat, lahoras cura aquel am sepultura en arena cauda, e mota suzor en banh, e al solelh espere per lonc temps; e cura aquel am medicinas dessicativas entro que sia sanat.	 However, if you fear for the patient and leave a large amount of water, then cure that by burying it in hot sand, and move it in warm baths, and expose it to the sun for a long time; and treat it with desiccating medicines until it is healed.

Capitol .lv.	 ### Chapter LV
De la curacio dels enfants les quals so natz les locs de la urina no-perforatz.	 ### About the care for infants born with unopened urinary passages.
Alcunas veguadas alcun dels enfantz es eyssi del ventre de la sua mayre e·l cap de la sua mixtio no es perforat (o es trauc streyt o no es en son loc).	 Sometimes one of the infants is born from its mother's womb with the head of its urinary passage not open (or it is very narrow or not in its proper place).
Donc cove coytar am perforacio de lu tantost que es nascut am spatum mot subtil segon aquesta forma:	 Therefore, one should pierce him with a subtle probe as soon as he is born, in this manner:
E aprop pausa en le trauc un clavil subtil de plom e ligua aquel, e te per tres jorns o per .iiii.tre.	 And place a thin lead probe into the opening and tie it there, and leave it for three days or four.
E quant vol urinar sia remaugut e hurine; e aprop retorne aquel.	 And when he wishes to urinate, remove it so that he can urinate; then replace it again.
E si tu no pauses le plom, ja es possible que la urina la qual va sobre le loc, no leysa aquest claure.	 And if you do not place the lead, it is possible that the urine going to this place will not leave through this opening. ismeyntre
Mays aquel del qual le trauc es streyt sia medicat am clavil de Plom, ayssi cum havem dit, per trops dias entro que sia amplificat.	 But that one whose passage is narrow should be treated with a lead probe, as we have said, for several days until it becomes enlarged.

E aprop perquier aquela e tota aquela deforo.	 Then look for it [the stone] and remove everything.

e scindeys en lu aquo que es entre·l cul e·ls genetius, no en le mieg loc, abantz al latz de la coyssa sinistra; e sia la seccio sobre aquela peyra e·l tieu dit sia en le cul, e sia fayta seccio transversa, per que la seccio defora sia ampla e dedintz streyta segon la quantitat que egrecio de la peyra sia a lu possibla, e no major, quar fort leu comprem le tieu dit le qual es en le cul la peyra deves la seccio, e es foro-getada ses defacultat. E si no es ayssi foro-getada, lahoras cove que tu engenes sobre aquel, o que strenguas sobre aquel am gesti decentment, la extremitat del qual sia ayssi cum lima am le qual strenguas sobre la peyra, e no evasesca de lu; o que entrometas dejos lu instrument subtil de curvada extremitat. de triangulada extramitat, agut, ficat en fust.	 with a pointed triangular end, sharp, inserted into a handle.
E aprop pren fiel, e lia am aquel la vergua dejos la peyra per so que no retorne a la vesica.	 Then take flax thread, and tie the bladder with it below the stone so that it does not return to the bladder.

Capitol .lxi.	 Chapter 61
De extraccio de peyra de las femnas.	 On the Extraction of a Stone from Women
Peyra en las femnas pauc es engendrada.	 A stone in women is rarely formed.
Mays si ve peyra ad alcuna de aquelas, lahoras dificil es la curacio de lu, e es prohibida per tropas manieyras.	 However, if a stone appears in one of them, then the cure for it is difficult and is prohibited by many ways.
La una de lor es quar la femna fort leu es verges.	 One of the causes is that the woman is very virgin.
E la segonda es quar tu no trobas femna be scient que descroba si meteyssa al metge quan es casta, o es de las femnas haventz maritz.	 And the second cause is that you do not find a good woman who reveals herself to the doctor when she is chaste, or one of the women having husbands.
La tersa es quar tu no hatrobas femna be sabent aquesta art, majorment la operacio am ma.	 The third cause is that you do not find a good woman who knows this art, especially the operation with the hand.
E la quarta es que·l loc de la seccio sobre peyra en las femnas es longinc del loc de la peyra, per que indigeys de seccio preonda, e en aquela es temor.	 And the fourth cause is that the location of the section on a stone in women is far from the stone's location, so you need a previous section, and this is fearsome.
Mays si necessitat provoca a tu ad aquo, lahoras cove que tu prenguas una femna metga be scient, e pauc es atrobada.	 But if necessity compels you to do so, then it is necessary that you take a skilled midwife, and few are found.
Mays si tu es privat de aquela, lahoras cerca metga quast e subtil, o presenta una femna matrona be esenhada en le feyt de las femnas, o femna que en aquesta art ennueys partida del art.	 But if you are deprived of her, then look for a skilled and subtle surgeon, or present a well-trained midwife in women's matters, or a woman who is knowledgeable in this art.
Donc fay aquela present, e comanda a lu que fassa tot aquo que tu li mandaras, de la enquisicio sobre la peyra al comensament; la qual causa es que reguarde si la femna es verges, lahoras cove que meta lo sieu dit en le cul de lu e quiera la peyra.	 Therefore, present her and command her to do everything that you tell her to do, from the inquiry about the stone at the beginning; the reason for this is that she should first check if the woman is a virgin, and then insert her finger into the woman's vagina and search for the stone. ️
Donc si atroba aquela, coarte aquela dejos le sieu dit, e lahoras comanda a lu que inscida sobre aquela.	 "Therefore, if one finds it, cut it off under its own tongue, and then command the patient to spit onto it.
Mays si no es verge, lahoras comanda a la matrona que entrometa lo sieu dit en le conh de la malauta e enquiera sobre la peyra, pus que pausa la sua ma sinistra sobre la vesica, e comprem aquela am bona comprecio.	 "But if it is not visible, then command the midwife to insert her finger into the patient's vagina and move it around until she finds the stone, while placing her left hand on the bladder and applying firm pressure.

E sapias que las specias de peyra son motas: quar de aquelas es pauca e gran, e leon e aspra, e longua e redonda, e havent ramps.	 "And you should know that there are many types of stones: some are small and large, round and pointed, long and short, and some have edges.
Donc tu sapias quantas specias so de lu per aquo que tu signifiques sobre aquo que vols.	 The translation of the given text into English is as follows:
E si tu veus flux de sanc, ajusta en le loc vetriol trissat e te aquela per una hora entro que sia abscindit le sanc, e aprop retorna a la tua operacio entro que la peyra sia fora-getada. Capitol lxii.	 Chapter LXII.
De seccio sobre ernia acoza.	 On the incision for hernia.
Hernia ayguoza no es sino agregacio de humiditat en le ciphac blanc lo qual es dejos la codena dels genetius contenent le huou, e es nompnat ciphac.	 A hydrocele is nothing more than an accumulation of fluid in the white sac that is left behind by the testicle cord containing the ovum, and it is called a sac.
E alcunas veguadas es en le propri pannicol le qual a lu preparec natura en la partida del huou, entro que sia cuyat que ja es autre huou; e es la codena del genetiu entre le ciphac blanc le qual havem dit, e no es aquo sino tart.	 And sometimes it is in the proper tissue that nature has prepared for the ovum until another ovum is made, and this is the cord of the testicle between the white sac we mentioned earlier, and this is not water but liquid.
E la generacio de aquest hernia es per debelitat la qual accideys als genetius, per que ad aquels es efundunda aquesta materia, e alcunas vetz accideys per percuscio fayta sobre les genetius.	 And the cause of this hernia is weakness that occurs in the genitals, because to those it is infiltrated with this matter, and sometimes it happens due to a blow to the genitals.
E aquesta humiditat es havent motas colors, quar la color de lu o es declinant a citrina o a sanguinent, o rog, o es negra feculenta, o es ayguosa blanqua, e es aquo que es mays.	 And this humidity has various colors, for its color is either fading to yellow or red, or reddish, or black and feculent, or watery white, and it is the latter that is most common.
E les senhals per les quals es saubut on es aquesta agreguacio de aygua so aquestz: quar si es en le ciphac blanc le qual havem dit, lahoras le apostema es redon declinant un pauc a longitut ayssi cum figura de huou, e appar le genetiu, quar la humiditat conte aquel de tota part.	 And the signs by which one knows that this accumulation of water is present are these: because if it is in the white cyphac that we have mentioned, then the swelling is round and slightly elongated like a figure of an egg, and it appears in the genital area, because the humidity contains that part on all sides.
E si la humiditat es en le propri pannicol, lahoras le apostema es redon am partida del huou e per aysso hom estima que es autre huou.	 And if the humidity is in the proper fatty tissue, then the swelling is round like half an egg, and for this reason one estimates that it is another egg.
E si la humiditat es entre la codena dels genetius e·l ciphac blanc, lahoras catz dejos le centiment.	 And if the humidity is between the genitals and the white cyphac, then it is like a bag hanging down.
E cum tu vols la cognicio de la color de la humiditat, lahoras tu esproa la color de la humiditat en le apostema am entromes cayrat del qual la forma es precedida; e segon aquo que es eyssit en le vestigi del entromes, jutga de aquo que es dedintz lu.	 And when you want to know the color of the humidity, then you prove the color of the humidity in the swelling with a small piece of white cloth; and according to what appears on the trace of the cloth, judge what is inside it.
Donc quan nos vinem a la curacio de lu am ferr, lahoras cove que comandem al malaute que sia fleubotomat si aquo es a tu possibla, e vezes le cos de lu ple.	 When we come to the care of him with iron, it is necessary that we command the patient to be bloodletted if this is possible for you, and often let his body bleed.
E aprop sia resupinat sobre le sieu dos sobre alcuna causa un pauc auta, e pausa dejos lu motz draps.	 Then let him be laid on his back over some cause a bit higher, and place beneath him soft cloths.
E aprop setz tu sobre la part sinistra de lu, e comanda al ministra que segua a la dextra de lu, le qual extenda la sua vergua a hun de dos latz a la codena dels genetius e a la partida del mirac del ventre.	 Then sit yourself on the left side of him, and command the assistant to stand at his right side, who should extend their hand to one of two sides at the fold between the thighs and the division of the navel of the belly.
E aprop pren spatum lat e scindeys la codena dels genetius del mieg loc per la longitut entro prop le pentenilh.	 Then take a lancea spatula and cut through the fold between the thighs from the middle to the length until near the anus.
E sia fayta la seccio segon rectetut engualment distant de la linha que deveseys la pel dels genetius, entro que pervengua al ciphac blanc comprehendent.	 And let the incision be made equally distant from the straight line that you should follow along the pubic bone until it reaches the white fat layer.
E excorja aquel, e observa, e guarda te per aysso que tu no inscidas aquel; e la tua excoriacio am la qual aquel excorjas per partida jassia que sia suspenduda am le huou mays e subtilment escruta am la excoriacio segon la quantitat a tu possibla.	 And scrape it off, and observe, and be careful not to cut too deep; and your incision with which you scrape should be divided downwards until it is suspended by the most subtle and finest investigation possible according to what is possible for you.
E aprop perfora le ciphac ple de aygua am perforacio ampla, e extratz tota l’aygua.	 Then pierce the fat layer full of water with a wide puncture, and extract all the water.
E aprop separa entre doas labias de la seccio am uncis, e exten le ciphac a las partidas desus; e no toques la codena les genetius comprehendent, e inscideys le ciphac en aquela manieyra que es a tu possible.	 And then separate between two lips of the section with scissors, and extend the thread to the divided parts above; do not touch the testicles, comprehending the genitals, and cut the thread in that manner which is possible for you.
E inscideys aquel am la sua totalitat o en pessas, e majorment le sieu latz subtil, quar si tu no perscrutas exquisidament la inscizio de lu, no es fayta segurtat que la aygua no retorne.	 And cut that part completely or in pieces, and especially its thin edge, for if you do not examine the incision thoroughly, there is no certainty that the water will not return.
Mays si le huou procezeys de aquela defora de la sua codena en la ora de la tua operacio, lahoras quan tu auras complida la seccio del ciphac, retorna dedintz aquel, e aprop ajusta las doas labias de la codena dels genetius am sutura, e aprop cura aquel ayssi cum las autras plagua, entro que sia sanat.	 But if the swelling proceeds from outside its testicle during your operation, then after you have completed the cutting of the thread, return it inside, and then join the two lips of the genital sac with stitching, and then treat that area as the other wounds until it is healed.
E si atrobas le huou corromput per autra malautia, lahoras cove que tu lies les vayssels les quals so sore le suspensori, e extrat le huou, e aprop cura aquel am aquo que havem dit.	 And if you find the swelling corrupted by another illness, then it is necessary for you to cut the vessels that are over the ligaments, and extract the testicle, and then treat it with the water we mentioned.
Mays si l’aygua es agreguada en doas partidas esemps, lahoras sapias que doas son las ernias; donc inscideys aquela partida segon que has feyt en l’autra engualment; e si es a tu vist que sia una opera, lahoras tu la fay.	 But if the water is gathered in two similar parts, then know that there are two hernias; therefore, cut that part just as you have done with the other one; and if it seems to you that it is one operation, then do it.
E aprop tu abstergiys le sanc, e entramet en las seccios lana submersa en oli o en oli rozat; e pausa deforo autra lana la qual tu as submersa en vi e oli, e expandeys aquela sobre dos genetius e·l mirac del ventre; e pausa desobre draps doblatz e pulvils, e lia aquels desobre am liament le qual es segon aquesta forma:	 And then you clean the blood, and insert between the sections wool soaked in oil or rosemary oil; and place another wool soaked in vinegar and oil outside, and spread it over two knees and the navel of the belly; and place above folded cloths and pills, and tie them securely with a bandage that is according to this form:
e aprop sian preses dos draps e sian humplitz de lana carmenada segon aquesta semblansa; e sian faytas las extremitatz am les quals es premut de coto o de lana humida, e sian agreguatz am strectura en le braguier de las braguas, e la una de las extremitatz prengua del cul entro al dos, e la segonda prengua a la partida del pantenilh, e dos extramitatz sobre dos coyssas dejos e dos extramitatz autras sobre dos angonars, e tota extrictura sia ajustada en le braguier de las braguas.	 And then two cloths are taken and moistened with carmenated wool according to this manner; the ends of which are used to press the area with cotton or wet wool, are added securely in the groin area of the pants. One end takes from the buttocks into the back, and the second takes from the crotch, and two ends below on two cushions, and two other ends above on two pillows, and all pressure is adjusted in the groin area of the pants.
E alcunas veguadas aquesta hernia es medicada artificialment am cauteri en loc de seccio am ferr; e es que tu prenguas cauteri cutellar subtil e que inscidas am aquel la codena dels ginitius, e es ignit segon que havem recomtat entro que sia descubert le ciphac blanc contenent la aygua, e lahoras tu pren cauteri segon aquesta forma:	 And sometimes this hernia is treated artificially with a cautery instead of a scalpel; and it is that you take a fine surgical knife and cut with it the cord of the testicles, and it is ignited as we have prescribed until the white bladder containing the water is revealed. Then you take the cautery in this manner:
e es asemblat a letra greca.	 And it resembles Greek letters.
E aprop perfora am aquel ciphac, e es ignit entro que tota la humiditat sia fora-gitada.	 And then puncture with that needle, and let it burn until all the moisture has been expelled.
E aprop exten le ciphac am uncis, e excorja am uncis, e excorja am cauteri subtil ignit; e inscideys aquel segon que es a tu possible entro que eradiques tot lu; e guarda te del huou que·l foc no·l toque.	 Then extend the needle with pincers, and scrape with pincers, and burn subtly with a pointed cautery; and cut that which is possible for you until you have eradicated all of it; and beware of the egg so that the fire does not touch it.
E sapias que aquesta operacio es pus salva e pus longinqua de flux de sanc, e milhor que operacio am seccio.	 And know that this operation is safer and more distant from blood flow, and better than an operation with cutting.
Mays si a tu fa contrarietat apostema caut en la hora de seccio o en hora de cauteri, o flux de sanc, lahoras cove que tu cures qual contrarietat fa a tu per aquo, am curacio la qual conveneys a lu segon que es dit.	 But if any swelling or abscess forms during the time of cutting or cautery, or if there is bleeding, then you should treat whatever problem arises in this manner, with the care that is appropriate for it as has been said.
Mays si le malaute es pauruc, e no spera la segonda operacio per la sua horribilitat, lahoras administra perforacio segon que yeu recomti aquo; e es quan es certificat deves tu, per aquo que havem dit de las significacios, que aquela hernia es ayguosa.	 But if the patient is very sick and does not expect to survive a second operation because of its severity, then perform perforation as I recommend here; and it is when you are certain, from what we have said about the signs, that that hernia is watery.
Lahoras cove que tu fassas sezer le malaute sobre alcuna cezelha elevada, aprop perfora le apostema en la partida pus bassa de lu am spatum lat, e pausa la perforacio segon la longitut del cos.	 Then you should have the patient lie on a raised seat, then puncture the abscess in its lowest part with a lance, and let the puncture be as long as the body.
E sia la apercio ampla entro que corro tota l‘aygua.	 And it should be an opening wide enough for all the water to flow through.
E aprop pausa sobre le loc coto e lia aquel e layssa aquel, per so que corro le romanent de l’aygua.	 Then place a cotton cloth over the area and tie it securely in order for the remaining water to flow out.
E aprop cura aquel entro que la plagua sia sanada.	 And then treat it so that the wound may heal.
Mays si contrarietat es a la egrecio de l’aygua en aquela hora tu perforas aquela: e aquo no es fayt sino per aquo quar le pannicol blanc en le orrifici de la plagua fa contrarietat e prohibeys le eyssiment de l’aygua, lahoras cove que tu metas en la plagua pena o instrument am la qual es extrayta l’aygua dels ydropitz, la forma del qual es precedida; o ajusta en la opprecio de la plagua un petit.	 But if there is resistance to the egress of water at that time, you should pierce it: and this is done only because the white membrane in the orifice of the wound creates resistance and prevents the exit of water, therefore you must insert into the wound a pen or instrument with which water is extracted from dropsy patients, the shape of which has been described above; or adjust a small opening in the opposition of the wound.
E sapias que l’aygua retorna, e es agueguada aprop vi meses o enaviro aquels; e cum es agreguada, lahoras sia perforat segon aquela meteyssa manieyra, quar le malaute ayssi passara les sieus dias.	 And know that the water will return, and it will accumulate again after about six months or a year; and when it is accumulated, then it should be pierced in the same manner, because the patient will thus endure his days.

De seccio sobre hernia carnosa e la curacio de lu.	 On the incision for a flesh-based hernia and its treatment.
Sapias que en la seccio sobre aquesta hernia es temor perdusent a pernicia en las majors disposicios; per que a mi es vista la dimissio de lu e esser salvat per aquela milhor.	 Know that in the incision of this hernia, there is great fear of loss through mishap in the major dispositions; for I have seen its dismissal and being saved by this method as the best.
E yeu so rememorant la operacio en aquela e las specias dels apostemas.	 And I am remembering the operation in that case and the characteristics of abscesses.
Donc, dic que l‘apostemas natz en les cos dels quals les genetius so conponutz e es fayt aquo per motas causas: o per superfluitat aguda agra, la qual es efundida als genetius, o per percuscio.	 Therefore, I say that abscesses occur in the bodies of those whose humors are corrupt and this happens for many reasons: either because of acute bitter excess which is infused into the humors, or because of a blow.
E es la color de la apostema segon la color del cos, e no es atrobat en lu dolor, e es apostema greu.	 And the color of the abscess corresponds to that of the body, and if pain is not found in it, it is a serious abscess.
E fort leu es apostema lapificada, del qual la color es fosca, e no es centiment a lu.	 And if the abscess is hard and light, it is calcified, of which the color is dark, and there is no sensation in it.
E alcunas veguadas es fayt per nodacio de las arcerias, e per imflacio de aquelas ayssi quo ja es perceubut la rememoracio de lu, o per imflacio de venas.	 And sometimes it is caused by the knotting of the arteries, and by the inflammation of these so that its memory is already perceived, or by the inflation of veins.
Mays aquo que es per imflacio de arcerias es conogut per la dispercio de la apostema quan compremas aquela am les tieus ditz; e no cove que aquel toques.	 But that which is caused by the inflation of arteries is known by the dispersal of the abscess when you press it with your fingers; and it should not be touched.
Mays aquel que es fayt per imflacio de vena no es dispergut de lu alcuna causa deves la compressio am les ditz.	 But that which is caused by the inflation of a vein does not disperse at all from it for any reason, due to compression with the fingers.
E ja es possible que sobre aquesta specia sia fayta seccio e sobre les autres carns; e es que tu inscida la codena dels genetius, e aprop esten le huou a las partidas desus, e extratz aquel del ciphac blanc, e deliura le suspensori dels vaysels, e ligua les, e inscideys le suspensori pus que tu deliuras aquel de tota partida de las partidas del huou.	 And it is possible that incision can be made on this type and on other fleshes; and it is that you cut the vein of the humors, and then extend the egg to the separated parts above, and extract what is white from it, and deliver the suspenders of the vessels, and tie them, and incise the suspenders after you have delivered all the parts of the egg.
Donc si l’huou ja es am aquelas carnadas consolida, lahoras cove que tu extraguas le huou e inscidas aquel.	 Therefore, if the egg is already cooked with these foods, then it is necessary for you to remove the egg and insert it again.
E si es adherencia entro alcuna causa del ciphac, o entre aquo que es entre les bayssels, lahoras cove que tu deliures tota aquela adherencia e inscidas aquela per inscizio redonda.	 And if there is an adhesion between the bladder and the intestines, or between other parts of the body, then it is necessary for you to remove all that adhesion and insert a round probe.
Mays si es nativitat de carn en le loc de la adherencia la qual es detras, lahoras cove que tu inscidas tot aquo que es de lu, e extraguas le huou ayssi cum havem dit.	 However, if there is a growth of flesh in the place of the adhesion which lies behind it, then you should insert everything that belongs to it and remove the egg as we have said.
Donc cum es complida la tua operacio, lahoras omple la plagua de lana imfuza en oli rozat e vi; e aprop cura aquela am l’autra curacio entro que sia sanat.	 Therefore, when your operation is completed, then fill the wound with wool infused in olive oil and wine; and afterwards, care for it with another treatment until it heals.

De la curacio de hernia que es de vitz.	 Of the treatment of a hernia that is caused by wind.

De la cura de hernia entestinal.	 About the treatment of internal hernias.
Le adveniment de aquesta hernia es per seccio que endeve en le ciphac extendut sobre le ventre de part dels angunars del mirac del ventre, per que deysendo les budels de aquela ruptura ad alcu dels budels.	 The onset of this hernia is due to a cut that occurs in the small intestine extended over the belly, because some of the intestines exit through that rupture into the abdominal cavity.
E aquesta ruptura es o del ciphac o de excencio de lu, e accideysso aquestas doas specias per motas causas: o percussio, o per sautz, o per clamor, o per elevacio de alcuna causa greu, o per semblantz.	 And this rupture can be either of the small intestine or of its skin, and these two types occur for many reasons: from a blow, from a fall, from a shout, from lifting something heavy, or from resemblance.
E·l senhal de aquo, quan es per extencio del ciphac, es que accideys pauc a pauc en lonc temps, e no accideys soptament, e es apostema engual entro ves le preon per so quar le ciphac comprem le budel.	 And the sign of this, when it is due to an extension of the small intestine, is that it happens little by little over a long time, and not suddenly, because the small intestine presses on the abdomen.
E le senhal de lu es quan es per seccio del ciphac, quar al comensament fa accidir dolor vehement sobtament; e es apostema divers aparent dejos la codena propdana aparent, e aquo es per eyssiment del budel, e·l cos de lu a las partidas deforo del ciphac.	 And the sign of it is when it is due to a cut in the small intestine, because at first it causes sudden and intense pain; and there is an apparent swelling below the navel, which is due to the escape of the intestines, and the body of the hernia appears outside the small intestine. 🔥

De hernia ventosa.	 About Hernias
En aquesta hernia no e vist alcu que sia estat ardit sus la curacio de lu am ferr.	 In this type of hernia, it has not been seen that anyone has been bold enough to treat it with iron.
E les primiers diyssero que es fayta ayssi cum havem recomtat en la hernia que es am vi; la qual es que tu lies les vayssels aprop la seccio sobre aquela am fecilitat de lu; e aprop secca en le mieg loc en enviro le apostema am aquo que obro aquel, entro que caian les vayssels. De mollificacio de la codena dels testiculs.	 Of softening the knot of the testicles.
Motas veguadas la codena dels testiculs en alcus homes es mollificada per aysso quar las carns que so entre aquela son mollificadas, e es fedat le reguardament de lu. Adonc necessari es ad aquel que es preguat en la curacio de lu que fassa jazer le malaute segon le sieu dos, e enscida tota la codena la qual es mollificada sobre la codena natural; e aprop que ajuste doas labias am la sutura.

Capitol .lxix.	 Chapter 69
De castracio.	 Of Castration.
Sapias que castratio en nostre ley es excomengada, mays per causa es legut a mi que·m remembre de lu en aquest libre; e no es necessaria la rememoracio de lu sino per doas manieyras, de las quals es la una per so que aquo sia en la sciensa del metge quan es enterroguat de aquela, que sapia la curacio de lu al qual accideys; e l’autra manieyra es que nos motas vetz havem necessitat de castracio de autras bestias per les juvamentz nostres per aquelas, ayssi cum de motos, e de bocs, e de porcs, e de semblantz a las bestias.	 Know that castration in our law is forbidden, but for some reasons it is permitted to me to write about it in this book; and there is no need to mention it except for two reasons: one is so that the doctor knows about it when he is questioned about it, so that he may know how to treat the person to whom it happens; and the other reason is that we sometimes have a need for castration of other animals for our benefit from them, such as with mules, oxen, pigs, and similar animals.
E donc dic que castracio es fayta en dos manieyras: o per atrissio, o per fissura a seccio.	 And therefore I say that castration is done in two ways: either by ligation or by incision and excision.
Mays en aquela que es fayta per atrissio, la via de la opera es que nos fassam cezer la bestia en aygua cauda entro que·ls genetius de lu sian mollificatz e sian linhitz e que pendan.	 But in the case that is done by ligation, the way to do it is to make the animal stand in hot water until its testicles are softened and lengthened and hanging down.
E aprop pren aquels am la tua ma entro que sian resols e no apparescan dejos le tocament.	 And then take those with your hand until they are dissolved and do not appear under the touch.
Mays en castracio fayta per fissura e seccio, cove que tu tenguas la bestia e premas la codena dels testicols de lu am la ma senestra.	 In a case of castration done by incision and section, you should hold the animal and press its spermatic cord with your left hand.
E aprop lia le suspensori, e inscideys sobre quascun huou am una seccio entro que dos huous proceseysso.	 And then tie the ligaments, and cut on each testicle with a section until you process two testicles.
E aprop inscideys aquels pus que auras quascu excorjat.	 And then cut those pus that you will have skinned off.
E no leysses sobre aquels del ciphac alcuna causa, sino le ciphac subtil le qual es sobre les vazes.	 Do not leave on the testicles any cause, but place a subtle ligation that is above the vessels.
E aquesta manieyra de castracio es milhor la qual es fayta per atrissio, quar atrissio fort leu layssa alcuna causa dels testicols per que la bestia desira coyt.	 And this method of castration is better when done by tightening, because tightening strongly avoids any cause from the testicles so that the animal desires coitus.
E aprop cura la plagua entro que sia sanada.	 And then care for the wound until it is healed.
Capitol .lxx.	 Chapter 70
De la cura de hermafrodozia.	 On the treatment of hermaphroditism.
Hermafrodozia en les homes es segon dos manieyras: la una es quar o appar en aquo que siec l’espazi en la codena de testiculs, en aquel que es entre dos testiculs figura quar cunh de femna en la qual so pels.	 Hermaphroditism in men occurs in two ways: the first is when it appears as if there is space between the spermatic cord and the testicles, in which there is a figure like a woman's vulva with pubic hair.
E alcunas veguadas de aquel corr urina le qual es en la codena dels testiculs.	 And at times from that pain there is urine which is in the cords of the testicles.
Mays en las femnas es una specia: e es que·l conh de la femna sobre le pentenilh es ayssi cum dos testiculs de home un pauc de tot yminiheys a la partida deforo ayssi cum le perpucii de home e dos testicols.	 But in women it is different: and that is that the vulva of the woman on the pubis is like two testicles of a man, a little smaller at the outer edge, similar to the foreskin of a man, and two testicles.
E la curacio es de tres specias: de dos dels homes e de una specia de las femnas.	 And the treatment is of three kinds: two for men and one for women.
E es que cove que tu inscidas aquelas carns ajustadas entro que efuga la emprecio de aquela, e aprop que cures aquelas am curacio de las autras plaguas.	 And it is necessary that you bind those swollen parts until the swelling subsides, and then treat them with the remedy for other diseases.
E en la segonda specia dels homes de la qual yeys urina la qual es en la codena dels testiculs, no es curacio ni opperacio en lu.	 And in the second kind of men, in which there is urine in the cord of the testicles, there is neither cure nor treatment for him.
Capitol .xxi.	 Chapter 21.
De lentinge e de carn eminent per causas de las femnas.	 Of swelling and prominent flesh caused by women's conditions.
Lentige fort leu es ajustada sobre causas naturals entro que es etressat e es fayt leg le reguardament; e alcunas veguadas es magnificada en alcunas femnas en tant entro que es spandit ayssi cum en les homes e perve entro al coito.	 Mild swelling is treated with natural remedies until it subsides, and care should be taken; and sometimes it becomes more pronounced in some women to the point that it spreads like in men and persists during intercourse.
Adonc cove que tu tenguas la superfluitat de lentinge am la tua ma o am unci e inscidas.	 Therefore, you must hold the excess swelling with your hand or grease and bind it.
E no ultimes en inscizio, majorment en le preon de la razit, per so que no endevengua flux de sanc.	 And do not hesitate at the beginning, especially in the region of the anus, so that there will be no flow of blood.

Mays carn nascuda es carn que nays en le horrifici de la mayre entro que umple aquel, e fort leu es eyssit a las partidas deforo segon semblansa de coa (e per aquo alscus primiers appelero aquo “malautia caudada”); donc cove que nos inscidam ayssi cum inscidem lentinge, e curem aquela entro que sia sanada.	 But flesh that is born is flesh that comes out from the mother's horror until it fills that, and it exits easily to the outer parts according to its likeness (and for this reason some first called it “tailed illness”); therefore, we should cut it like lint and care for it until it is healed.
Capitol .lxxii.	 Chapter 72.
De curacio de alratica.	 On the treatment of anal fissures.
Alratica es que le conh de la femna no sia perforat, o sia le trauc petit.	 Anal fissure is when the woman's anus is not pierced, or it is a small opening.
E es o natural o accidental.	 And it can be either natural or accidental.
Accidental es per malautia la qual ha precedit, e aquela es fayta o per carn nada ajustada o per ciphac subtil o espes.	 Accidental is due to illness that has occurred beforehand, and this can be caused by unsuitable flesh or subtle or thick excrement.
E es fayt o en le preon de la mayre, o en les costatz de lu, o en le pus sobira de lu, o en le pus bas de lu, e prohibeys de cuoyt e de enprenguacio e de enfantament, e fort leu prohibeys las mestruas.	 And it occurs either in the mother's anus, or on its sides, or on its upper part, or on its lower part, and it is forbidden to have sex, to become pregnant, and to give birth, and it is especially forbidden during menstruation.
E la cognicio de aquela es fayta per reguardament de la metrona, si la oppilacio es apparent, propdana; mays si no es apparent, lahoras tu cerqua aquela am les tieus ditz o am le ray.
